title: Definition of n
text: n is the notation used for the sample size.

title: Finding n
text: The correct answer is hidden within this excerpt of the problem: \"A study was then done to see if the mean time has increased in the new century. A random sample of 26 first-time convicted burglars in a recent year was picked. The mean length of time in jail from the survey was three years with a standard deviation of 1.8 years.\"
